title: AI-Driven Extortion Attacks Rising
summary: One in three mobile users targeted by sophisticated AI-driven extortion attacks. Learn how to protect yourself and your organization.

title: New Phishing Campaign Targets Healthcare Sector
summary: Security researchers have identified a new phishing campaign specifically targeting healthcare organizations. Be vigilant with suspicious emails.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication Best Practices
summary: Review the latest MFA best practices to ensure your accounts remain secure. Remember to use authenticator apps over SMS when possible.

title: Ransomware Prevention Checklist
summary: A comprehensive checklist to help prevent ransomware attacks. Regular backups and employee training are key components.

title: Zero-Day Vulnerability in Popular Software
summary: A critical zero-day vulnerability has been discovered. Ensure all software is updated to the latest version immediately.
